snippet.title: Mario Paint #4: BS Yuushou Naizou Ban (No Commentary)
snippet.description:
Hey hey!! Mario Paint is back!! But with a twist, it's the Satellaview version from 1993 released 2 years before the Satellaview officially released!! You can use your controller in this version of Mario Paint, controller disconnected so I have to use the keyboard for the rest of the video!! Don't forget to like the video, comment and if you're new sub!!! Next video whenever I upload!!! Stay rad!!
Check out my discord (new permalink) https://discord.gg/u342gy2
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Markiegee55
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/markiegee55/
Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/Markiegee55
